pages.text: My pigs have been such cuties lately that Iâ€™ve decided to treat them to golden carrots, and to my surprise, they got so happy with me they led me straight to a colony of Truffles! They are such farmhands!

pages.title: Salting Foods
pages.text: I've found that salting my food makes it taste way better! (Who could've guessed) Keeping me full for longer as well. I think I can also propagate the salt I already have by slowly dripping water onto a block of raw salt.
